title: Nursing Professional Role Redesign and Emergency Learning Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A practical educational program to enhance medical professionals' job adaptability and learning competencies in emergency situations such as COVID-19 response

learning_goals: Learners acquire three or more new clinical procedures in authentic clinical environments through job shadowing within four weeks

Based on mentoring feedback, learners select three core job domains (e.g., patient management, record systems, team collaboration), develop a job redesign plan with at least two improvement goals per domain, and submit an implementation report within two weeks.
Learners apply patient-caregiver communication strategies in crisis situations with over 80% situational handling accuracy through workshops and simulations
Learners improve task coordination and resource allocation skills by over 70% using urgent learning outcomes in team-based simulations
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
